description: Archimedes was one of the greatest of Greece's philosophers and scientists.  Can enchant shields only.
Artemis, the Greek goddess of the hunt, is renowned for her skill with the bow.  Can enchant bows only.
The drink of Dionysus, Greek god of wine and revelry, is a potent brew indeed.  Can enchant rings and amulets.
The Golden Fleece, sought after by Jason and his Argonauts, is rumored to hold great power as well as great beauty.  Can enchant torso armor only.
Hecate is a mysterious Greek goddess associated with the moon, childbirth, and magic.  Can enchant rings and amulets.
Herakles was the strongest of all the Greek heroes.  Can enchant all armor.
Hermes the Messenger is the swiftest of the Greek gods.  He is known for his iconic winged sandals.  Can enchant leg armor only.
Prometheus, son of the titan Iapetus, gave the gift of fire to mankind.  Can enchant all weapons.

relicName: Essence of the Valor of Achilles
description: Achilles was the greatest of all the Greek warriors of the Trojan War.  His strength and speed in battle were legendary.  Can enchant all weapons.
Zeus is the mightiest of the gods of Olympus.  The thunderbolt is his weapon and symbol.  Can enchant all weapons.
Amun-Ra, ruler of the sun, is the greatest of the Egyptian gods.  Can enchant all armor.

relicName: Essence of the Ankh of Isis
description: Isis is queen of the Egyptian gods.  Her symbol, the ankh, is associated with healing and immortality.  Can enchant rings and amulets.

properties.offensiveLifeLeech: 2% of Attack damage converted to Health
4% of Attack damage converted to Health
6% of Attack damage converted to Health

description: Anubis, a jackal-headed god, is ruler of the Egyptian underworld.  Can enchant all weapons.

relicName: Essence of the Djed of Osiris
description: The Djed is the backbone of Osiris, lord of the dead.  Can enchant all weapons.

Set is the Egyptian god of evil.  In an attempt to take control of the throne of the gods, Set turned on his brother Osiris, brutally hacking the latter's body apart and scattering the pieces across the land.  Can enchant all armor.

relicName: Essence of the Udjat of Horus
description: The Udjat is the eye of Horus, hawk-headed god of the sky.  It symbolizes protection and power.  Can enchant all armor.

relicName: Essence of the Code of Hammurabi
description: Hammurabi, king of Babylon, was revered for bringing justice to his people with his code of laws.  Can enchant rings and amulets.

relicName: Essence of the Domain of the Dragon-Kings
description: The Dragon-Kings are the masters of water in China.  Ocean, rain, lake, and river - all are theirs to command.  Can enchant all armor.
True to the tenets of Taoism, even Guan-Yu, the Taoist god of war, only fights when all other options have been exhausted.  Can enchant torso armor only.

relicName: Essence of the Jade Emperor's Serenity
description: The Jade Emperor is the ruler of the Chinese gods.  He is a contemplative deity who rarely interferes with the affairs of god or man.  Can enchant all armor.
Li-Nezha, a Chinese trickster god, is as nimble as he is crafty.  Can enchant all armor.

relicName: Essence of the Monkey King's Trickery
description: The Monkey King, the most mischievous of all the Chinese gods, is also one of the most powerful.  His cunning has lured many an unwary foe to do his bidding.  Can enchant rings and amulets.
Shen-Nong is the Chinese god of plants and medicine. He is a master of herbs - and not all are meant to cure.  Can enchant all weapons.
Yen-Lo-Wang is a god of Death and the ruler of Feng-Du, the Chinese Hell.  Can enchant all weapons.
Archimedes was one of the greatest of Greece's philosophers and scientists.  Can enchant shields only.
Artemis, the Greek goddess of the hunt, is renowned for her skill with the bow.  Can enchant bows only.
The drink of Dionysus, Greek god of wine and revelry, is a potent brew indeed.  Can enchant rings and amulets.
The Golden Fleece, sought after by Jason and his Argonauts, is rumored to hold great power as well as great beauty.  Can enchant torso armor only.
Hecate is a mysterious Greek goddess associated with the moon, childbirth, and magic.  Can enchant rings and amulets.
Herakles was the strongest of all the Greek heroes.  Can enchant all armor.
Hermes the Messenger is the swiftest of the Greek gods.  He is known for his iconic winged sandals.  Can enchant leg armor only.
Prometheus, son of the titan Iapetus, gave the gift of fire to mankind.  Can enchant all weapons.

relicName: Embodiment of the Valor of Achilles
description: Achilles was the greatest of all the Greek warriors of the Trojan War.  His strength and speed in battle were legendary.  Can enchant all weapons.
Zeus is the mightiest of the gods of Olympus.  The thunderbolt is his weapon and symbol.  Can enchant all weapons.
Amun-Ra, ruler of the sun, is the greatest of the Egyptian gods.  Can enchant all armor.

relicName: Embodiment of the Ankh of Isis
description: Isis is queen of the Egyptian gods.  Her symbol, the ankh, is associated with healing and immortality.  Can enchant rings and amulets.

Hollow fang of a Cave Bat.  Can enhance all weapons.
Toughened hide of a wild boar.  Can enhance all armor.
High quality feathers.  Can enhance all armor.
A large turtle shell.  Can enhance shields only.
A scrap of skin from a Desert Hag.  Can enhance all armor.
A long, sharp claw.  Can enhance all weapons.
A disgusting glob of pus, blood, and bile.  Can enhance rings and amulets.
Claw of a Peng.  Can enhance all weapons.
Sharp, jagged tooth torn from a Raptor's mouth.  Can enhance amulets only.
The razor-sharp claw of a Saber Lion.  Can enhance all weapons.
A lump of dense plant matter.  Can enhance all armor.
The thick, coarse pelt of the Yeti.  Can enhance all armor.
The dark blood of a fallen demon.  Can enhance rings and amulets.
Feathers from a carrion bird.  Can enhance all armor.
The intricate inner workings of an automaton.  Can enhance torso armor only.
The thick outer shell of an insectoid monster.  Can enhance shields only.
A wispy, glowing substance.  Can enhance rings and amulets.

relicName: Essence of the Blade of Thanatos
description: Thanatos, the incarnation of death, carries a sword with the power to rend the very souls of mere mortals.  Can enchant all weapons.

relicName: Essence of the Chill of Tartarus
description: In the deepest pits of the underworld lies Tartarus.  Cold as the grave and swathed in darkness, it is here that punishment is meted out for those mortals foolish enough to oppose the will of the gods.  Can enchant all weapons.

relicName: Essence of the Cunning of Odysseus
description: Although not as strong or swift as the other heroes of legend, Odysseus' formidable guile made him a match for any foe.  Can enchant head armor only.

relicName: Essence of the Iron Will of Ajax
description: Numbered among the greatest of the heroes of the Trojan war, Ajax was known not only for the strength of his arm, but even more for his indomitable spirit.  Can enchant all armor.
Persephone, favored daughter of the earth goddess Demeter, was forced into marriage with Hades.  She now shares rule of the underworld, yet it brings her only sorrow.  Can enchant all jewelry.

relicName: Essence of the Rage of Ares
description: Ares, the Greek god of war, is venerated and feared in equal measure.  He is cruel, vengeful, and nearly mad - only a fool would risk his wrath.  Can enchant armbands and bracelets.

relicName: Essence of the Shade of Hector
description: Hector, prince of Troy, was renowned for his noble spirit and steadfast nature.  He fell defending his homeland, mourned even by his enemies.  Can enchant all shields.

relicName: Embodiment of the Blade of Thanatos
description: Thanatos, the incarnation of death, carries a sword with the power to rend the very souls of mere mortals.  Can enchant all weapons.

description: Hector, prince of Troy, was renowned for his noble spirit and steadfast nature.  He fell defending his homeland, mourned even by his enemies.  Can enchant all shields.
A splinter from one of the Crystals of Erebus, the source of Hades' power in the world of the living.  Can enhance head armor only.
A sticky mass of webbing pulled from an Albino Spider abdomen.  Can enhance all armor.
Blood drained from a Fury's still-beating heart.  Can enhance all weapons.
A patch of rough, durable skin ripped from the flesh of a Hydradon.  Can enhance all armor.
The jagged shell of a Karkinos.  Can enhance shields.
The agonized soul of a creature of darkness.  Can enhance all jewelry.
A splinter from one of the Crystals of Erebus, the source of Hades' power in the world of the living.  Can enhance head armor only.

Opens a conduit of pure energy that flows from the celestial planes into the caster, granting them improved control over their mystical powers.
Calls upon a mighty Cyclops to do the caster's bidding.  Due to the iron will of the Cyclops, however, mastery of this fearsome being can only be held for a short time.
Calls on the power of the skies to rain fury upon nearby enemies.
Creates a field of energy that weakens the defenses of enemies caught inside.
Inspires the caster, greatly improving their offensive capabilities in melee combat.
Sends a devastating flurry of blades in all directions.
Creates a maelstrom of destructive power around the caster.
Encases the caster in a mystic shield that absorbs damage from all elemental attacks.
Blasts surrounding enemies with a wave of energy that saps their physical strength, greatly reducing their ability to deal damage with most weapons.
Fills the caster with incredible fury, increasing their speed and the damage of their attacks.
Sends a blast of bitter cold air out from the caster's location.
Summons a pair of powerful Harpy witches.  Using fierce lightning attacks, these fearsome beasts devastate enemies from a distance.
Grants an aura which improves both the armor and attack strength of the caster and their allies.
Strengthens the will of the caster, greatly improving their ability to withstand damage in battle.
Summons a mighty Djinn spellcaster.  Though powerful in war, the Djinn is also valuable for the mystical enhancements it provides for the caster and their allies.
Sends shockwaves of force through the surrounding ground, damaging and stunning any nearby enemies.
Raises a force of flame-enchanted skeletal warriors to do the caster's bidding.
Lays down a field of vampiric energy.  The life force of any enemies who cross into this field will be ripped from their souls and transferred to the caster.
Lashes out in fiery retaliation each time the caster is struck by a melee attack.

itemName: Greater Scroll of the Breaking Wheel
description: Sends a devastating flurry of blades in all directions.

itemName: Greater Scroll of the Crushing Vortex
description: Creates a maelstrom of destructive power around the caster.
Encases the caster in a mystic shield that absorbs damage from all elemental attacks.
Blasts surrounding enemies with a wave of energy that saps their physical strength, greatly reducing their ability to deal damage with most weapons.
Fills the caster with incredible fury, increasing their speed and the damage of their attacks.

itemName: Greater Scroll of the Ice Nova
description: Sends a blast of bitter cold air out from the caster's location.

itemName: Greater Scroll of the Storm Witches
description: Summons a pair of powerful Harpy witches.  Using fierce lightning attacks, these fearsome beasts devastate enemies from a distance.

itemName: Greater Scroll of the Stalwart Alliance
description: Grants an aura which improves both the armor and attack strength of the caster and their allies.
Strengthens the will of the caster, greatly improving their ability to withstand damage in battle.

itemName: Divine Scroll of the Archmage's Fury
description: Grants the caster improved control over their inner powers, allowing them to use their skills more quickly and more effectively.
Rips the very fabric of the universe asunder, devastating all who enter its area of influence.

itemName: Divine Scroll of the Arrow Dancer
description: Grants the caster improved reflexes, allowing them to dodge most incoming projectiles.
Summons an enormous demonic beast from the netherworld.

itemName: Divine Scroll of the Maddened God
description: Summons the avatar of a mad god.  Although control can only be maintained for a short while, the god can wreak havoc in even this short time span.
Turns the inner power of surrounding enemies against them, burning their bodies with the power of their own magic.

itemName: Divine Scroll of the Breaking Wheel
description: Sends a devastating flurry of blades in all directions.

itemName: Divine Scroll of the Crushing Vortex
description: Creates a maelstrom of destructive power around the caster.
Encases the caster in a mystic shield that absorbs damage from all elemental attacks.
Blasts surrounding enemies with a wave of energy that saps their physical strength, greatly reducing their ability to deal damage with most weapons.
Fills the caster with incredible fury, increasing their speed and the damage of their attacks.

itemName: Divine Scroll of the Ice Nova
description: Sends a blast of bitter cold air out from the caster's location.

itemName: Divine Scroll of the Storm Witches
description: Summons a pair of powerful Harpy witches.  Using fierce lightning attacks, these fearsome beasts devastate enemies from a distance.

itemName: Divine Scroll of the Stalwart Alliance
description: Grants an aura which improves both the armor and attack strength of the caster and their allies.
Strengthens the will of the caster, greatly improving their ability to withstand damage in battle.

properties.offensiveManaBurn: 45 ~ 65% Energy Drained (100% Energy Drained Causes Damage)

properties.offensiveLifeLeech: 10% of Attack damage converted to Health
9% of Attack damage converted to Health
